(Duh! I'm glad you just reminded me about Terrorsaur, RoboRick. My 
mind is starting to slip.)


Terrorsaur:




Terrorsaur was relieved that wasn't aboard Phobia's ship. He had 
heard the engines blow, and moved away from it. He was proud of his 
flight abilities. It made him feel superior. He waited until things 
settled down when he lowered down, setting Cave-In on the ground and 
transformed to beast mode. He stood from a short distance, watching 
the others.
